metadata.project_name: Critical App Delivery Acceleration + 50% Cost Reduction

work_areas.title: Cost Reduction
work_areas.description: Reduce delivery + AI runtime costs by 50%

packets.title: Form vertical pods
packets.scope: Create end-to-end pods (PM + domain + builders + AI operator) and assign critical workflows.

packets.title: Define mission-path scope
packets.scope: Reduce each critical app to 5-7 executable capabilities with trigger/output/SLA/failure mode.

packets.title: Implement 72-hour build loop
packets.scope: Standardize day-1 scaffold, day-2 thin slices, day-3 integration and acceptance drills.

packets.title: Adopt two-lane execution
packets.scope: Run feature lane and reliability lane in parallel for every sprint.

packets.title: Week-2 user pilot policy
packets.scope: Require real-user pilot by week 2 for every critical capability.

packets.title: Scope cut to mission path
packets.scope: Freeze all non-critical backlog for 60 days and publish defer list.

packets.title: Model routing + budget caps
packets.scope: Default to low-cost model tier; gate expensive models; set token/runtime/tool caps per workflow.

packets.title: Vendor/tool consolidation
packets.scope: Remove duplicate SaaS tools across CI/monitoring/PM and enforce approved stack list.

packets.title: Pod consolidation
packets.scope: Reduce cross-team handoffs and consolidate into fewer accountable pods.

packets.title: Cost telemetry dashboard
packets.scope: Track cost per capability, per model, and per deployment with weekly variance alerts.

packets.title: Evidence-gated done criteria
packets.scope: No completion without tests, contract checks, rollback path, and KPI linkage.

packets.title: AI role policy
packets.scope: Define AI as draft/review accelerator; human owns architecture and acceptance decisions.

packets.title: Regression prevention gates
packets.scope: Add required pre-merge checks for integration, performance, and critical-path smoke tests.

packets.title: Build shared accelerator templates
packets.scope: Create reusable auth, audit, event schema, CI/CD, deployment, and incident runbook templates.

packets.title: Template adoption mandate
packets.scope: Require new critical capabilities to start from approved templates unless exception approved.

packets.title: Instrument delivery KPIs
packets.scope: Measure lead time, deploy frequency, failure rate, MTTR, and rework %. Publish weekly trend.

packets.title: Weekly kill-review cadence
packets.scope: Terminate workstreams not moving KPI within 2 weeks; reallocate capacity to mission path.

packets.title: 90-day budget rule rollout
packets.scope: Enforce 70/20/10 allocation: core capabilities/reliability/experiments.

packets.title: Executive operating review
packets.scope: Run weekly review on cycle time, burn, risk, and blocked dependencies; approve corrective actions.

packets.title: Target validation
packets.scope: Confirm 50% cost reduction and cycle-time improvement against baseline with signed report.
